mapper.select: SELECT id, max_cpv, brand_name, title, description, is_exclusive_internal_ad, total_amount, reader_password, special_contract, received_account_number, payment_condition, promoted_amount, advertiser_user, admin_user, type, status, started_at, ended_at, created_at, modified_at, receipted_at FROM campaign

SELECT id, max_cpv, brand_name, title, description, is_exclusive_internal_ad, total_amount, reader_password, special_contract, received_account_number, payment_condition, promoted_amount, advertiser_user, admin_user, type, status, started_at, ended_at, created_at, modified_at, receipted_at FROM campaign WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO campaign (max_cpv, brand_name, title, description, is_exclusive_internal_ad, total_amount, reader_password, special_contract, received_account_number, payment_condition, promoted_amount, advertiser_user, admin_user, type, status, started_at, ended_at, created_at, modified_at, receipted_at) VALUES (#{maxCpv}, #{brandName}, #{title}, #{description}, #{isExclusiveInternalAd}, #{totalAmount}, #{readerPassword}, #{specialContract}, #{receivedAccountNumber}, #{paymentCondition}, #{promotedAmount}, #{advertiserUser}, #{adminUser}, #{type}, #{status}, now(), now(), now(), now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE campaign SET title = #{title}, modified_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
